panels.description: Displays the 95th percentile of requests handled under the the Y axis(in seconds).
panels.title: ${Percentile}th Percentile[10m]: /v1/client Response Times

panels.description:
This graph represents how many times each token type was used over a 24h period. 
Machine tokens are used when a client authenticated with an auth token checks in.
Resource tokens are used when a client authenticated with ua-contracts checks in.
Auth tokens are used whenever a new client is registered using old style auth tokens.
Sync tokens are used whenever an on-prem server syncs patches, on-prem servers can also sync via resource tokens.
panels.title: Token Usage

panels.description: Reasons why a client was reject from the contracts server.
panels.title: Contracts Response Errors
